title: Ping Spiking and staying at high PING Com paired too normal HELP PLEASE!
body:
Hello I just wanted to know if any one else was having this problem just now Normally I sit around 40-45 MS while playing and suddenly I jumped too 50-60 MS on my last game of the day. Wanted to know if any one was having this same problem my fiancee is also having this problem and we both have spectrum as our ISP provider. 

I hope that the throttling isn't starting >.>

replies.body: Hmmmm it's a little bump but I can understand where that might be a little jarring if it's not what you're accustomed to. Do me a favor and try switching to ethernet to see if that helps whatsoever, but it'd be worth trying a couple other steps really quickly as well. Update your DNS settings to 8.8.8.8/8.8.4.4 which can usually get a better ISP route, resulting in faster speeds.
